Getting Personal

December 26, 2011

I’ve found that I love writing and sharing my thoughts with others and I wanted to find a way to allow me to do that more often. In the past, I’ve been blogging on and off on my business blog this year, but I’ve been wanting to write about things that didn’t necessarily relate to my business and I didn’t have a place to share those thoughts.

My biggest blocking point in the past, was finding the right medium that allowed me to write like a hacker. Using Monca√≠, I am rectifying that problem. I’ve imported the posts from my business blog that are better suited here. I’m going to document how my site works also, but for now all I have to say is — To be continued …
